类的使用
org.springframework.web.method.support.HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite

  • 使用HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.method.support
    Generic support classes for handler method processing.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation
    MVC infrastructure for annotation-based handler method processing, building on the org.springframework.web.method.annotation package.

    • org.springframework.web.method.support中HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite的使用

      返回HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite的org.springframework.web.method.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite.addResolver(HandlerMethodArgumentResolver resolver)
      Add the given HandlerMethodArgumentResolver.
      HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite.addResolvers(HandlerMethodArgumentResolver... resolvers)
      Add the given HandlerMethodArgumentResolvers.
      HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite.addResolvers(java.util.List<? extends HandlerMethodArgumentResolver> resolvers)
      Add the given HandlerMethodArgumentResolvers.
      参数类型为HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite的org.springframework.web.method.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void InvocableHandlerMethod.setHandlerMethodArgumentResolvers(HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite argumentResolvers)
      Set HandlerMethodArgumentResolvers to use to use for resolving method argument values.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite的使用

      返回HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HandlerMethodArgumentResolverComposite ExceptionHandlerExceptionResolver.getArgumentResolvers()
      Return the configured argument resolvers, or possibly null if not initialized yet via ExceptionHandlerExceptionResolver.afterPropertiesSet().
